References
863
Lowe, D. G. (1999). Object recognition from local scale-invariant features. In Seventh

tional Journal of Computer Vision, 60(2):91–110.

Luong, Q.-T. and Vi´eville, T. (1996). Canonical representations for the geometries of

malization. In IEEE Computer Society Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern

(2008).

Magnor, M. (2005). Video-Based Rendering. A. K. Peters, Wellesley, MA.
864
Computer Vision: Algorithms and Applications (September 3, 2010 draft)

IEEE

(2008).

and localize junctions in natural images. In IEEE Computer Society Conference on

Malisiewicz, T. and Efros, A. A. (2008). Recognition by association via learning per-

Mallat, S. G. (1989). A theory for multiresolution signal decomposition: the wavelet rep-

865
